name: Exquisite Pair of Early 19th Century Armchairs

condition.details: Reupholstered. Refinished. Wear consistent with age and use.

specifications.rawSpecificationsHTML: Pair of Early 19th Century Armchairs, Walnut, France 1800 Introducing an Exquisite Pair of Early 19th Century Armchairs, a true testament to the elegance and craftsmanship of the Empire style. These chairs, hailing from France, are crafted from magnificent solid walnut, showcasing the timeless beauty of this exquisite wood. Each chair has been meticulously restored by professionals, ensuring they remain in impeccable condition. The upholstery has been thoughtfully replaced, with the seat and backrest structure crafted in accordance with traditional restoration methods. The chairs are elegantly upholstered in a high-quality black fabric with subtle black stripes, offering a striking contrast against the rich walnut wood. The simplicity of their form, combined with intricate turning and delicate ring details, reflects the sophistication and high-quality craftsmanship of the early 19th century. Dimensions: • Seat Height: 43 cm • Backrest Height: 93 cm • Width: 62.5 cm • Depth: 45 cm This pair of chairs is a magnificent example of early Empire furniture, perfect for those who appreciate the finest in art and design.
specifications.rawSpecificationsText:
Pair of Early 19th Century Armchairs,
Walnut, France 1800

Introducing an Exquisite Pair of Early 19th Century Armchairs, a true testament to the elegance and craftsmanship of the Empire style. These chairs, hailing from France, are crafted from magnificent solid walnut, showcasing the timeless beauty of this exquisite wood.

Each chair has been meticulously restored by professionals, ensuring they remain in impeccable condition. The simplicity of their form, combined with intricate turning and delicate ring details, reflects the sophistication and high-quality craftsmanship of the early 19th century.
